name: Cylon Attack (Beebugsoft)
overview: Not to be confused with the game of the same name by A&F Software, Cyclon Attack (also called Cylon) by M.J. Taylor and published by Beebugsoft is a fixed screen gallery shooter for the BBC Micro. It was released in 1982. Note: Sold by Beebugsoft as "Games 5". First advertised in volume 1, issue 8, of Beebug magazine, in December 1982, although it may have been advertised on a seperate leaflet slightly earlier.
